description:
PlebToken is re-used:
	- PlebToken (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#6-10)
	- PlebToken (contracts/PlebToken.sol#8-34)

PlebToken is re-used:
	- [PlebToken](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L6-L10)
	- [PlebToken](contracts/PlebToken.sol#L8-L34)

description:
Reentrancy in PlebToHill.endRound(uint256) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#107-152):
	External calls:
	- (sent) = participants[roundId][0].walletAddress.call{value: prizeAmount}() (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#119-121)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participants[roundId][0].winnings = prizeAmount (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#124)

	External calls:
	- [(sent) = participants[roundId][0].walletAddress.call{value: prizeAmount}()](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L119-L121)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [participants[roundId][0].winnings = prizeAmount](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L124)

description:
Reentrancy in PlebStaking.claimReward(uint256) (contracts/PlebStaking.sol#165-183):
	External calls:
	- (sent) = stakers[stakeId].wallet.call{value: reward}() (contracts/PlebStaking.sol#171)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stakers[stakeId].claimedRewards = stakers[stakeId].claimedRewards.add(reward) (contracts/PlebStaking.sol#174-176)
	- stakers[stakeId].rewardDebt = stakers[stakeId].rewardDebt.add(reward) (contracts/PlebStaking.sol#177-179)

	State variables written after the call(s):

elements.name: require(bool,string)(msg.sender == stakers[stakeId].wallet,Wrong wallet address,only staker of this stake can perform this operation)

description:

description:
Reentrancy in PlebStaking.stake(uint256) (contracts/PlebStaking.sol#79-117):
	External calls:
	- plebToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount) (contracts/PlebStaking.sol#90)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stakers[newStakeId] = StakeDepositData(newStakeId,msg.sender,amount,block.timestamp,block.timestamp + stakingPeriod,0,amount.mul(accHedronRewardRate).div(1e18),0,true) (contracts/PlebStaking.sol#93-103)
	- stakersData.push(stakers[newStakeId]) (contracts/PlebStaking.sol#106)
	- stakes[msg.sender].push(stakers[newStakeId]) (contracts/PlebStaking.sol#105)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [PlebStaking.stake(uint256)](contracts/PlebStaking.sol#L79-L117):
	External calls:
	- [plebToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount)](contracts/PlebStaking.sol#L90)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [stakers[newStakeId] = StakeDepositData(newStakeId,msg.sender,amount,block.timestamp,block.timestamp + stakingPeriod,0,amount.mul(accHedronRewardRate).div(1e18),0,true)](contracts/PlebStaking.sol#L93-L103)
	- [stakersData.push(stakers[newStakeId])](contracts/PlebStaking.sol#L106)
	- [stakes[msg.sender].push(stakers[newStakeId])](contracts/PlebStaking.sol#L105)

description:
Reentrancy in PlebToHill.addParticipant(uint256) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#158-233):
	External calls:
	- (sent) = participants[roundId][newParticipantId - 2].walletAddress.call{value: prizeAmount}() (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#201-203)
	- (success) = address(pleb_stake_address).call{value: serviceFee}(abi.encodeWithSignature(accumulateReward())) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#207-209)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- WinningTransfered(roundId,participants[roundId][newParticipantId - 2].walletAddress,participants[roundId][newParticipantId - 2].invested_amount,participants[roundId][newParticipantId - 2].participantId,prizeAmount) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#211-217)

	- [(success) = address(pleb_stake_address).call{value: serviceFee}(abi.encodeWithSignature(accumulateReward()))](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L207-L209)
	Event emitted after the call(s):

description:
Reentrancy in PlebToHill.endRound(uint256) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#107-152):
	External calls:
	- (sent) = participants[roundId][0].walletAddress.call{value: prizeAmount}() (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#119-121)
	- (success) = address(pleb_stake_address).call{value: serviceFee}(abi.encodeWithSignature(accumulateReward())) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#125-127)
	- (success) = address(pleb_stake_address).call{value: (serviceFee + prizeAmount)}(abi.encodeWithSignature(accumulateReward())) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#137-139)
	- plebToken.mint(wallet,amount_lose) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#149)
	External calls sending eth:
	- (sent) = participants[roundId][0].walletAddress.call{value: prizeAmount}() (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#119-121)
	- (success) = address(pleb_stake_address).call{value: serviceFee}(abi.encodeWithSignature(accumulateReward())) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#125-127)
	- (success) = address(pleb_stake_address).call{value: (serviceFee + prizeAmount)}(abi.encodeWithSignature(accumulateReward())) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#137-139)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RoundFinished(roundId) (contracts/PlebToHill.sol#151)

	- [(success) = address(pleb_stake_address).call{value: serviceFee}(abi.encodeWithSignature(accumulateReward()))](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L125-L127)
	- [(success) = address(pleb_stake_address).call{value: (serviceFee + prizeAmount)}(abi.encodeWithSignature(accumulateReward()))](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L137-L139)
	- [plebToken.mint(wallet,amount_lose)](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L149)
	External calls sending eth:
	- [(sent) = participants[roundId][0].walletAddress.call{value: prizeAmount}()](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L119-L121)
	- [(success) = address(pleb_stake_address).call{value: serviceFee}(abi.encodeWithSignature(accumulateReward()))](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L125-L127)
	- [(success) = address(pleb_stake_address).call{value: (serviceFee + prizeAmount)}(abi.encodeWithSignature(accumulateReward()))](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L137-L139)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [RoundFinished(roundId)](contracts/PlebToHill.sol#L151)
